name: Apricot Hill
overview:
Apricot Hill is a digital lifestyle multimedia and social utility company with integrated products to define lifestyle and manage life.

Through proprietary technology Apricot Hill delivers inspiration to define lifestyle via a digital lifestyle magazine www.myApricotHill.com based on six lifestyle tenets - style, traditions, entertaining, destinations, vitality and sustainability.

Apricot Hill’s free Card Exchange welcomes everyone to build personal libraries of digital cards from a limitless resource of ideas and experiences based on Apricot Hill content and that of its business and brand partners.

Apricot Hill’s online subscription-based Membership Community (March 2013) delivers personal management tools for members to capture, organize and remember ideas, experiences and milestones with added benefit to opt-in to a dynamic members-only sharing platform.
